name: Defiance
Lore: 'Fleet rear guard. Weapon batteries hard-wired to central targeting processor. Coordinates vicious crossfire against enemy captial starships.',
Text: 'May add 5 pilots, 6 passengers, 1 vehicle and 3 starfighters. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2. Each of it''s weapon destiny draws are +2. Capital starships it hits are power -5.',
